Class LikeDAOPostgres

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.persist.postgres.LikeDAOPostgres
All Implemented Interfaces:
LikeDAO
public class LikeDAOPostgres extends Object implements LikeDAO
PostgreSQL implementation of the LikeDAO interface. Provides methods for managing likes by interacting with the PostgreSQL database.

      Removes a like from a post in the PostgreSQL database.
      Specified by:
      removeLikeOnPost in interface LikeDAO
      Parameters:
      user_id - The ID of the user who liked the post.

    • getPostLikes

      public List<Like> getPostLikes(int idPost)
      Retrieves all likes for a specific post from the PostgreSQL database.
      Specified by:
      getPostLikes in interface LikeDAO
      Parameters:
      idPost - The ID of the post to retrieve likes for.
      Returns:
